price: 6. Aucune cité n’avait cru de celles-là que Nous avons fait périr. Ceux-ci vont-ils donc croire ?
arabic: مَآ ءَامَنَتۡ قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَآۖ أَفَهُمۡ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: mā āmanat qablahum min qaryatin ahlaknāhā afahum yu'minūna
